SEARCH
Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This class represents a Date with day, month, and year. It implements methods to validate the date and compare dates and provide a string presentation of the date.

  • Constructor Details

    • Date

      public Date()
      Default constructor for Date class. Initializes the date to January 1st, 1900.

      year - the year of the date

      Returns:

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Validates if the current date instance is a valid calendar date.
      Returns:
      true if the date is valid, false otherwise

    • isToday

      public boolean isToday()
      Check if this Date represents today's date by comparing it to the current Calendar system.
      Returns:
      true if the date is today, false otherwise.

    • isPastDate

      public boolean isPastDate()
      Checks if this Date represent the date before today. The method compares the year, month, and day of the current date object with today's date.
      Returns:
      true if this Date is before today, false otherwise.

    • isFutureDate

      public boolean isFutureDate()
      Checks if this Date represents a date after today's date. The method compares the year, month, and day of the current date object with today's date.
      Returns:
      true if this Date is after today, false otherwise.

    • isWeekend

      public boolean isWeekend()
      Checks if this Date is on a Weekend ( Saturday or Sunday).
      Returns:
      true if the date is a weekend, false otherwise.

    • isWithinSixMonths

      public boolean isWithinSixMonths()
      Checks if this Date is more than six months after today's date.
      Returns:
      true if this date is more than six months after today's date.

      public int compareTo(Date other)
      Overrides the compareTo method from the Comparable interface. Compares this Date object with another Date object.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      other - the Date object to compare to
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this date is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified date.
